Name.label: Glycogen storage disease due to glucose-6-phosphatase deficiency type Ia
Glycogen storage disease due to glucose-6-phosphatase deficiency

TextSection.Contents: Glycogenosis due to glucose-6-phosphatase deficiency (G6P) type a, or glycogen storage disease (GSD) type 1a, is a type of glycogenosis due to G6P deficiency (see this term).

Name.label: E (exact mapping (the terms and the concepts are equivalent))

Synonym.label: GSD due to G6P deficiency type 1a
